House.origin: [the votes of both houses shall be determined by yeas and nays " U.S. Constitution art. I"]

1 a.definition: a building (as a single or multiple family house, apartment, or hotel room) serving as living quarters and usually including the curtilage

sub_terms.b: a building (as one's residence or a locked place of business) in which one is entitled to protection (as from warrantless searches and seizures) under the Fourth Amendment to the U.S. Constitution

2 a.definition: a legislative assembly esp. that constitutes a division of a bicameral body [the votes of bothshall be determined by yeas and nays "art. I"]

sub_terms.b: the building or chamber where such an assembly meets
sub_terms.c: a quorum of such an assembly
